data.name: Way of Rhea
data.detailed_description:
Way of Rhea is a puzzle adventure. Hard puzzles, forgiving mechanics. Solve mind bending color puzzles, unlock new areas of a vibrant hub world, chat with townsfolk, and undo any mistake with the press of a button.

Solve Puzzles


Solve challenging puzzles that build off each other—each puzzle is there for a reason.

Explore The World


Unlock new areas of the hub world that contain new puzzle mechanics! You'll learn to use the color changing orbs, teleporter pads, circuits, and more.

Chat With The Locals


Some of the locals want to help! ...some would rather you go away.

Undo Your Mistakes


Undo any mistake with the press of a button.

Join Our Discord

If you want to stay up to date on the latest developments, or are interested in hearing about opportunities to beta test, you can join our Discord!

data.short_description: A puzzle adventure. Hard puzzles, forgiving mechanics. Solve mind bending color puzzles, unlock new areas of a vibrant hub world, chat with townsfolk, and undo any mistake with the press of a button.
data.reviews:
“The artwork is gorgeous, the puzzles are clever, and everyone playing it, including my wife, were having a blast.”
Nintendo Fuse

“Even at the busy PAX West show-floor, this mellow twist proved to be relaxing and engaging.”
Cubed3

“The characters are cute, the art style is interesting, the puzzles are fun, the music is great, and the premise is unique. What more do you need in a puzzle platformer?”
SUPERJUMP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.10.5 (OS X Yosemite)
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
